body_html:
When I run make html my trace begins as follows, so something is clearly odd:

Running Sphinx v1.5.4
loading pickled environment... done
building [mo]: targets for 0 po files that are out of date
building [html]: targets for 0 source files that are out of date
updating environment: 0 added, 6 changed, 0 removed
reading sources... [100%] torchvision/utils                                                                                                                                                        
/Users/kai/miniconda3/lib/python3.5/site-packages/torch/nn/modules/instancenorm.py:docstring of torch.nn.InstanceNorm2d:3: ERROR: Unexpected indentation.
/Users/kai/miniconda3/lib/python3.5/site-packages/torch/nn/modules/instancenorm.py:docstring of torch.nn.InstanceNorm2d:4: WARNING: Literal block ends without a blank line; unexpected unindent.
/Users/kai/miniconda3/lib/python3.5/site-packages/torch/nn/modules/instancenorm.py:docstring of torch.nn.InstanceNorm2d:23: WARNING: Definition list ends without a blank line; unexpected unindent.
/Users/kai/Projects/pytorch/docs/source/sparse.rst:27: WARNING: Block quote ends without a blank line; unexpected unindent.
/Users/kai/Projects/pytorch/docs/source/sparse.rst:41: WARNING: Block quote ends without a blank line; unexpected unindent.

I installed sphinx and sphinx_rtd_theme directly from conda instead of using pip - this might be the issue? Not sure why it would be though.

body:
When I run `make html` my trace begins as follows, so something is clearly odd:

```
Running Sphinx v1.5.4
loading pickled environment... done
building [mo]: targets for 0 po files that are out of date
building [html]: targets for 0 source files that are out of date
updating environment: 0 added, 6 changed, 0 removed
reading sources... [100%] torchvision/utils                                                                                                                                                        
/Users/kai/miniconda3/lib/python3.5/site-packages/torch/nn/modules/instancenorm.py:docstring of torch.nn.InstanceNorm2d:3: ERROR: Unexpected indentation.
/Users/kai/miniconda3/lib/python3.5/site-packages/torch/nn/modules/instancenorm.py:docstring of torch.nn.InstanceNorm2d:4: WARNING: Literal block ends without a blank line; unexpected unindent.
/Users/kai/miniconda3/lib/python3.5/site-packages/torch/nn/modules/instancenorm.py:docstring of torch.nn.InstanceNorm2d:23: WARNING: Definition list ends without a blank line; unexpected unindent.
/Users/kai/Projects/pytorch/docs/source/sparse.rst:27: WARNING: Block quote ends without a blank line; unexpected unindent.
/Users/kai/Projects/pytorch/docs/source/sparse.rst:41: WARNING: Block quote ends without a blank line; unexpected unindent.
```

I installed `sphinx` and `sphinx_rtd_theme` directly from `conda` instead of using `pip` - this might be the issue? Not sure why it would be though.
